Package view

Class PatientView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.PatientView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplayMenu
    public class PatientView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplayMenu
    The PatientView class provides an interface for patients to interact with the Hospital Management System (HMS) This class allows patients to view and update medical records, set availability,

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void availableAppointmentView()
      Displays available appointment slots for the patient.
      void cancelAppointmentView()
      Allows the patient to cancel an existing appointment.
      void displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu for the patient and handles user interactions.
      void rescheduleAppointmentView()
      Allows the patient to reschedule an existing appointment.
      void scheduleAppointmentView()
      Allows the patient to schedule a new appointment by selecting a date and timeslot.
      void updatePersonalInfoView()
      Allows the patient to update their personal information, such as name, email, and phone number.
      void viewMedicalRecordView()
      Displays the patient's medical record.
      void viewPastAppointmentOutcome()
      Displays the patient's past appointment outcomes.
      void viewScheduledAppointmentView()
      Displays the patient's scheduled appointments.

        Constructs an instance of PatientView
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient object representing the current patient.
        appointmentManager - The manager to handle appointment-related operations.
        doctorAvailabilityManager - The manager to handle doctor availability.
        userManager - The manager to handle user-related operations.
        scanner - The Scanner object for reading user input.
